## Code Blocks

We can include code blocks and highlight specific rows.

```{.R code-line-numbers="1,5"}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot)

data(mtcars)
head(mtcars) |> print()
```
:::
::: {.notes}

Keep notes for your slide here

:::


::: {.incremental}
## Executable Code Blocks

We can also run code blocks and show the output rather than the code

```{.R}
#| echo: false
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot)

data(mtcars)
head(mtcars) |> print()
```

:::
